short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your web browsing experience on Google Chrome with eyeBrowse, an eyebrow navigation tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eyeBrowse is an extension that allows users to change the background colour of any page on developer.chrome.com and open a new tab with customized features applied.
